channel.title: Testimonial – M.F. McGinn – Heating and Gas

item.title: D. Goulden
item.dc:creator: mcginn002
item.description: “New heating system and bathroom installed all good and a great price! Definitely use again.”
item.content:encoded: “New heating system and bathroom installed all good and a great price! Definitely use again.”

item.title: D. Palmer
item.dc:creator: mcginn002
item.description: “Old central heating system taken out and new combi boiler and radiators installed by Michael, no problems clean and efficient, turned up on time, would definitely recommended!”
item.content:encoded: “Old central heating system taken out and new combi boiler and radiators installed by Michael, no problems clean and efficient, turned up on time, would definitely recommended!”

item.title: Mrs. M. Turner
item.dc:creator: mcginn002
item.description: “Michael installed new boiler and complete central heating system in my house, very happy the with work carried out, highly recommended”
item.content:encoded: “Michael installed new boiler and complete central heating system in my house, very happy the with work carried out, highly recommended”

item.title: Success Takeaway
item.dc:creator: daz
item.description: “We love working with M.F. Mcginn because he is fair with his prices. We do a lot of business with him and are always looked after extremely well. His prompt and pleasant service is second to none and the after-hours service is a boon that gives us peace of mind.”
item.content:encoded: “We love working with M.F. Mcginn because he is fair with his prices. We do a lot of business with him and are always looked after extremely well. His prompt and pleasant service is second to none and the after-hours service is a boon that gives us peace of mind.”

item.title: C. Bottomley
item.dc:creator: daz
item.description: “I have been very happy with the service from Michael McGinn. I have given his business cards to all my friends. He was patient, very helpful and just wonderful.”
item.content:encoded: “I have been very happy with the service from Michael McGinn. I have given his business cards to all my friends. He was patient, very helpful and just wonderful.”
